caption.p: Phonon densities-of-states (DOS) curves of (a) ScS, (b) YS, (c) ZrS, (d) LuS, (e) Sc 31S 32, (f) Y 31S 32, (g) Zr 29S 32, and (h) Lu 31S 32: negative values of the wavenumbers (shaded in gray) correspond to imaginary modes, which typically point to a dynamically unfavorable situation for a given material.
